# Support

## How to get help

If you need help with BMDE, please follow these steps:

1.  **Check the Documentation**: Read the [official documentation](https://urv-teacher.github.io/bmde/) to see if your question is answered there.
2.  **Search Issues**: Search the [existing issues](https://github.com/URV-teacher/bmde/issues) to see if someone else has already reported your problem or asked your question.
3.  **Open an Issue**: If you can't find an answer, please [open a new issue](https://github.com/URV-teacher/bmde/issues/new/choose).
    *   Use the "Bug report" template if something isn't working as expected.
    *   Use the "Feature request" template if you have an idea for a new feature.
    *   For general questions, you can also open an issue and label it as `question`.

## What to include in your request

When asking for help, please provide as much information as possible, including:

*   The version of BMDE you are using (`bmde --version`).
*   Your operating system and version.
*   The exact command you ran.
*   The full output/error message you received.
*   Steps to reproduce the issue.
